title: Redstone is back again
summary: The java based Discord bot that has been inactive for years is now back!
content:
The bot has been completely re-written in python and almost all legacy features are in the process of being ported over! A new era for this fun bot.

New features

  • Better error handling: A robust error handling system has been introduced to combat silent failures and bot crashes.
  • New Console: There is now a new console view for when the bot turns on that displays Ascii art and now accepts developer commands.
  • Better Performance: The new rewrite has allowed for much better performance and less lag when issuing commands.
  • Coming soon: Once the features are fullu ported over, the invite link will be made shared via the bot's website. Stay tuned!.

title: Live migration from Ubuntu 24.10 (ARM) to Debian 13 (ARM)
summary: A step-by-step guide to swapping all Ubuntu components to Debian equivalents. Do not do this on a production system unless you know what you are doing.
content:
Are you a Ubuntu user? Ever wanted to switch to Debian but didn't want to deal with the easy installer? Well this guide is for you! Here a step by step method of swapping your Ubuntu system for a Debian one! I did this as a fun experiment to see if this could even be possible. Happy to report it is!

Let's Begin:

  1. Perform a full system update and then upgrade. sudo apt update && upgrade
  2. Download the latest Debian keyrings directly from the their website.
  3. Make a backup of the sources, and then replace them with debian ones.
  4. sudo apt update && upgrade (This might break things, be prepared to debug.)
  5. This entry is still a work-in-progress. Rest of documentation will be added later. Check back later!
